revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBone AI |revision=-64 (Rev B) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SeeedStudio |price=187 |est_release_date=06/2022 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TDA4VM;TDA4VM88TGBALFR; |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC16G-TB29 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=Q3222PM1WDGTK |expansion_if_types=NGFF (M.2), USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, TAG-CONNECT |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |eth_chip2_model=DP83867CR |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Four-Port USB 3.0 Hub;TI;TUSB8041;;1;,,, 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24FC04HT-I/OT;;1;,,, 2.8-5.5V PMIC w/ 5 Buck & 4 LDO Regulators;TI;TPS6594-Q1;;2;,,, 2.75-6V Adjustable-Frequency Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS62813;;1;,,, 15kV ESD-Protected Dual CMOS Switch Debouncer;Maxim;MAX6817;;1;,,, USB Type-C Configuration Channel Logic & Port Control;TI;TUSB322I;;1;,,, Dual Channel Adjustable Current-Limited Power Switch;TI;TPS2561;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;3;,,, Single Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;TI;SN74LVC2G74;;1;,,, 2.7V-22V, 4.5A Power Mux w/ Seamless Switchover;TI;TPS2121;;1;,,, 1.5A Low-Dropout Linear Regulator w/ Soft-Start;TI;TPS74801;;2;,,, Wide Input Range Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;LM5141;;1;,,, Dual Buffer & Driver w/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G241;;2;,,, Low-Voltage Single FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CBTLV1G125;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08DCKR;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXB0108;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22918;;1;,,, 5.7V, 6A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22965;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch (USB 3.0);TI;TPS2553;;1;,,, Single Schmitt-Trigger Buffer;TI;SN74LVC1G17;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;2;,,, ESD Protection Diode;TI;TPD1E05U06;;10; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Mini DisplayPort, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, UART, GPIO, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2021.01; |stock_os=Linux;5.10.90;Debian 11; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=debian |default_pass=temppwd |oui_eth=24:76:25 }} {{TagLine|Embedded Artificial Intelligence Board}} :{{ProductPage|https://beagleboard.org/ai-64}} :Model/Brand - BeagleBone AI-64 :([[BeagleBoard]].org [[BeagleBone AI]]) ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] ''Jacinto'' TDA4VM :Dual Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz, :3x Dual Core ARM (Cortex-M4F) @1.0GHz *GPU: ''PowerVR Rogue'' 8XE GE8430 3D :VPU: 2x 1080p30 H.264 encode, :8x 1080p30 H.264/H.265 decode *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *PCIe: NGFF M.2 (E key) socket *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB (Type-C) for :power and superspeed dual-role controller *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel or USB (Type-C) ===Links=== *[https://www.hackster.io/news/beagleboard-org-launches-high-performance-embedded-ai-64-bit-beaglebone-ai-64-board-91386326837d ''BeagleBoard.org Launches Embedded AI 64-Bit BeagleBone AI-64 Board'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/06/15/beaglebone-ai-64-sbc-features-ti-tda4vm-cortex-a72-r5f-soc-with-8-tops-ai-accelerator/ ''BeagleBone AI-64 SBC features TI TDA4VM Cortex-A72/R5F SoC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-ai-64-comes-with-tda4vm-soc-from-texas-instruments/ ''BeagleBone AI-64 comes with TDA4VM SoC from Texas Instruments'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ==Images== File:BeagleBone AI-64 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:BeagleBone AI-64 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__
